name: NIGHT RUNNER (Champlain Game Academy 22)
description:
SPEED RUNNER

Play an exciting Sci-fi bullet hell set in a cyberpunk world. Become a samurai and use melee and ranged attacks to defeat a biker gang. 

CONTROLS:

Left click in the air to perform a sword spin.

Right-click on a wall to shoot your gun.

Press space and use the arrow keys/ASWD to dash from wall to wall.

Use the arrow keys/ASWD to climb walls.

Devs:

Linda McFaul - Programming

Ruari Maynes - Art, Animation, and Programming

Cole Smith - UI Programming

Finn Stoakley - Art, Animation, and AI Programming

Jordan Santangelo - Art, Animation, and SFX

(QUIT DOES NOT WORK IN BROWSER MODE)
